content.original: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.original: This Ammo bin contains the infamous 'Hydra' Missiles from the deep periphery, carrying a volatile payload of a High Explosive and Incendiary Materials.

content.original: Being unable to efficiently extend the PDHS effects to the entire Engine Block have Luthien Engineers managed to combine a Compact with PDHS Cooling, creating a less Bulky Cooling at cost of some weight. Treating the Engines Cooling System with this experimental system improves the general performance at risk of a Fatal Explosion. VOLATILE!

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: 瞄准电脑(TC)种复杂的电子设备,和普通的瞄准系统不同,它可以帮助机甲战士瞄准他们的对手.后座补偿器和陀螺仪稳定器用于防止后座和运动等因素造成武器漂移, 同时电脑还考虑了大气和其他条件,以准确的"指引"目标.这是一种可以进行更精确射击的设备,尤其是使用自然精确系统.

content.content: 硬化装甲是一种较厚的装甲类型,它使用了多个叠加的装甲板来为敌人的火力提供额外防御力.虽然能够承受比标准装甲多的伤害,但过多的装甲板数量和缺少灵活性使得使用它的任何单位都更难驾驶,事实上,硬化装甲非常重,无法安装在气垫船、垂直起降器或地效飞行器上.降低即将到来的致命伤害. 可激活:失败时对核心躯干造成伤害和严重损伤

content.original: Developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2487, Endo Steel was designed especially for use in BattleMech skeletons. The Corean OM-77 Endo-Steel was an attempt to incorporate Clan Manufacturing Techniques in Inner Sphere Processes, slightly reducing its size at increased costs.
content.prevOriginal: Developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2487, Endo Steel was designed especially for use in BattleMech skeletons. The Corean OM-77 Endo-Steel was an attempt to incorporate Clan Manufacturing Techniques in Inner Sphere Processes, slightly reducing its size at increased costs.
content.content: 内构钢于2487年被人类霸权开发,专门作为机甲骨架材料.朝鲜OM-77内构钢尝试将氏族的制造技术和内天体的工艺结合,在增加成本的情况下略微减少其尺寸.

content.original: A Early prototype attempt to combine Clan Grade Endo Steel techniques with the Endo-Composite Materials that provided a greater weight saving but is highly complicated to repair.
content.prevOriginal: A Early prototype attempt to combine Clan Grade Endo Steel techniques with the Endo-Composite Materials that provided a greater weight saving but is highly complicated to repair.
content.content: 一种结合氏族内构钢技术和内构复合材料早期原型,能够节省更多的重量,但维修起来非常复杂.

content.original: An Advanced derivative of Composite and Endo Composite having a greater Structure Weight reduction without the fragility imposed.
content.prevOriginal: An Advanced derivative of Composite and Endo Composite having a greater Structure Weight reduction without the fragility imposed.
content.content: 复合材料和内构复合材料的高级衍生物,能更大减轻结构重量.但不易碎.

content.original: An early proto-type version of Endo Steel, slightly bulkier than the final production version.
content.prevOriginal: An early proto-type version of Endo Steel, slightly bulkier than the final production version.

content.original: This Endo Composite Structure got interwoven with a Triple Strength Myomer prototype that grants improved Speed and Melee Damage.
content.prevOriginal: This Endo Composite Structure got interwoven with a Triple Strength Myomer prototype that grants improved Speed and Melee Damage.
content.content: 这种内构钢复合结构与三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)原型交织在一起,提高了速度和近战伤害.
更强的近战和更快的速度

content.original: The Federated Suns introduced the Composite Internal Structure. Inspired by the Endo Steel chassis, the FedSuns engineers produced a chassis that was light weight but wasn't as bulky as the Endo Steel skeleton. Though they were successful, the materials used in the Composite Structure were incredibly fragile.
content.prevOriginal: The Federated Suns introduced the Composite Internal Structure. content.content: 恒星联邦引入复合内部结构.受内构钢(Endo-Stell)制地盘的启发,恒星联邦的的工程师制成了一种重量轻但不像内构钢骨架那么笨重的地盘.尽管他们取得了成功,但复合结构中使用的材料非常脆弱.

content.original: This 'Cooling Jacket' is barely more than a Heat Exchanger wired around the arm actuators, I must say, I'm actually impressed at this ...if doesn't blow up that is. WEAPON LOWER ARM ACTUATOR.
content.prevOriginal: This 'Cooling Jacket' is barely more than a Heat Exchanger wired around the arm actuators, I must say, I'm actually impressed at this ...if doesn't blow up that is. WEAPON LOWER ARM ACTUATOR.

content.original: Weapon Actuators are a collection of specialized Servos and Compensators allowing a BattleMech's Arm mounted Weapons to Fire with greater Accuracy. WEAPON LOWER ARM ACTUATOR. Reduces Melee, Improves Arm Mounted Weapons.

content.original: Hardened Armor is a thicker armor type that uses multiple overlapping plates to provide additional protection against enemy fire. Though capable of diverting more damage than standard armor, the increased number of armor plates and their lack of flexibility makes any unit employing it more difficult to pilot, and can affect the speed as well. In fact, Hardened Armor is so heavy that it cannot be mounted on hovercraft, VTOLs, or WiGE vehicles. Reduces incoming Critical Hits. CASE Enabled

content.original: A further development of the Sanctus armor, the Exsecratio has supposedly been bathed in the blood of enemies of the Word, giving the 'Mech the power to hide from foes. However, it is more realistic to think that the armor uses some kind of advanced Stealth technology, and the rest is just one of the Word of Blake's typical rituals to instill more zeal into its members.

content.original:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.prevOriginal:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.content:
所有机甲都配备了一个可以升级以提高性能的可配置座舱.指挥控制台只能安装在重型或突击性机甲上.控制台为加入指挥和控制设施的第二驾驶员添加了一整套的控制系统, 以提高主动性并更好的协调小队

到3025年, 星联的老式指挥控制台已经非常罕见, 因为搭载该装备的机甲是战斗中敌人最喜爱的目标.大多数仍然存在的也已经被用作培训使用.

content.content: 干扰敌人的系统并提高小队的士气

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: 瞄准电脑(TC)种复杂的电子设备,和普通的瞄准系统不同,它可以帮助机甲战士瞄准他们的对手.后座补偿器和陀螺仪稳定器用于防止后座和运动等因素造成武器漂移, 同时电脑还考虑了大气和其他条件,以准确的"指引"目标.这是一种可以进行更精确射击的设备,尤其是使用自然精确系统.

content.original: Buffered Vehicular Direct Neural Interface was an improvement on standard VDNI developed for the Manei Domini. Introduced several years after the start of the Jihad, buffered VDNI was available only to those who held the rank of Omicron. While operating similarly to standard VDNI, the buffered model further enhanced the neurological fail-safes to create a safer, more potent system.

content.original:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.prevOriginal:

The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.content:
所有机甲都配备了一个可以升级以提高性能的可配置座舱.指挥控制台只能安装在重型或突击性机甲上.控制台为加入指挥和控制设施的第二驾驶员添加了一整套的控制系统, 以提高主动性并更好的协调小队

到3025年, 星联的老式指挥控制台已经非常罕见, 因为搭载该装备的机甲是战斗中敌人最喜爱的目标.大多数仍然存在的也已经被用作培训使用.
突破射击, 提高精度/后座

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: 瞄准电脑(TC)种复杂的电子设备,和普通的瞄准系统不同,它可以帮助机甲战士瞄准他们的对手.后座补偿器和陀螺仪稳定器用于防止后座和运动等因素造成武器漂移, 同时电脑还考虑了大气和其他条件,以准确的"指引"目标.这是一种可以进行更精确射击的设备,尤其是使用自然精确系统.

content.original: Introduced in 2740 by the Terran Hegemony, the Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry (MASC) is a piece of equipment that allows a BattleMech to move at twice its walking speed. However, actuators were not built for this kind of stress, and prolonged usage of MASC systems can damage the leg actuators of a BattleMech. Although this is unlikely to immobilize the BattleMech, the danger of destroyed actuators is enough for cautious warriors to limit their use in battle. Activatable: DEALS DAMAGE AND CRIT TO LEGS ON FAILURE
content.prevOriginal: Introduced in 2740 by the Terran Hegemony, the Myomer Accelerator Signal Circuitry (MASC) is a piece of equipment that allows a BattleMech to move at twice its walking speed. However, actuators were not built for this kind of stress, and prolonged usage of MASC systems can damage the leg actuators of a BattleMech. Although this is unlikely to immobilize the BattleMech, the danger of destroyed actuators is enough for cautious warriors to limit their use in battle. Activatable: DEALS DAMAGE AND CRIT TO LEGS ON FAILURE
content.content: 由人类霸权于2740引入,人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)是一种可以让机甲以两倍其普通行走速度移动的装备.然而腿部机构不是为这种压力制造的.长时间使用MASC系统可能会损坏机甲腿部机构.虽然这不太可能使机甲瘫痪,但腿部机构被摧毁的危险足以让机甲战士谨慎的在战斗中使用.可激活:失败时对腿部造成伤害和严重损伤.
人工肌肉加速信号电路(MASC)

content.original: The Chameleon Light Polarization Shield was designed to make a 'Mech invisible to the naked eye. By using a primitive mimetic system, the outline of the 'Mech carrying it was broken up, blending into the surrounding terrain. The Chameleon was very effective because unlike the Null Signature System it worked against sensor systems and visual observation.

content.original:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.prevOriginal:
All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock cockpit configuration, which can be upgraded for improved performance. Command Consoles are components that can only be mounted on Heavy or Assault Class 'Mechs. The Console adds a complete set of controls for a second MechWarrior with added command and control facilities, allowing for better Lance coordination by upgrading initiative.

Star League-vintage Command Consoles are very rare by 3025 because 'Mechs equipped in this way were favoured targets in battle. Most still existing have been relegated to training duties.
content.content:
所有机甲都配备了一个可以升级以提高性能的可配置座舱.指挥控制台只能安装在重型或突击性机甲上.控制台为加入指挥和控制设施的第二驾驶员添加了一整套的控制系统, 以提高主动性并更好的协调小队

到3025年, 星联的老式指挥控制台已经非常罕见, 因为搭载该装备的机甲是战斗中敌人最喜爱的目标.大多数仍然存在的也已经被用作培训使用.

content.original: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.prevOriginal: Targeting Computers are sophisticated pieces of electronics that, unlike normal targeting systems, physically help MechWarriors target their opponents. Recoil compensators and gyroscopic stabilizers are used to prevent normal weapon drift from factors such as recoil and movement while the computer accounts for atmospheric and other conditions to present an accurate ''lead'' on the target. This allows for more surgical precision of weapons fire, especially with naturally accurate systems.
content.content: 瞄准电脑(TC)种复杂的电子设备,和普通的瞄准系统不同,它可以帮助机甲战士瞄准他们的对手.后座补偿器和陀螺仪稳定器用于防止后座和运动等因素造成武器漂移, 同时电脑还考虑了大气和其他条件,以准确的"指引"目标.这是一种可以进行更精确射击的设备,尤其是使用自然精确系统.

content.original: The Seraphim Suite was developed by the Word of Blake as a response to the clans Nova CEWS, completing the circle as the Society originally created the Nova as a response to the C3 technology. By using all their knowledge of communications and advanced ECM technology, the Blakeist scientists created a combination of sensors, ECM and other EWS equipment that practically put it on par with the clan tech. However, it's prohibitive size and weight kept it from being used outside of the Word's largest 'Mechs.
content.prevOriginal: The Seraphim Suite was developed by the Word of Blake as a response to the clans Nova CEWS, completing the circle as the Society originally created the Nova as a response to the C3 technology. By using all their knowledge of communications and advanced ECM technology, the Blakeist scientists created a combination of sensors, ECM and other EWS equipment that practically put it on par with the clan tech. However, it's prohibitive size and weight kept it from being used outside of the Word's largest 'Mechs.
content.content: 炽天使套件是由布莱克之道开发的,作为对氏族超新星CEWS的应对方案,完成了一个轮回,因为氏族最初创造了超新星是为了应对C3技术.布莱克派科学家利用他们所有的通信知识和先进的电子对抗技术,创造了传感器、电子对抗和其他电子战设备的组合,实际上使其与氏族技术不相上下.然而,它令人望而却步的尺寸和重量使它无法在世界上最大的机甲之外有用武之地.

content.original: The rogue scientists of the Society developed the Nova CEWS after hearing about the C3 Systems used by the Inner Sphere. By combining elements of the Watchdog CEWS with a C3 system, they created a tool that could find enemy forces, hide the unit using it in an ECM bubble, and automatically provide targeting data to other friendly units. In addition, the Nova CEWS didn't require pre-configuration for the C3 capability; It could be programmed on the fly to respond to availability of friendly forces.
content.prevOriginal: The rogue scientists of the Society developed the Nova CEWS after hearing about the C3 Systems used by the Inner Sphere. By combining elements of the Watchdog CEWS with a C3 system, they created a tool that could find enemy forces, hide the unit using it in an ECM bubble, and automatically provide targeting data to other friendly units. In addition, the Nova CEWS didn't require pre-configuration for the C3 capability; It could be programmed on the fly to respond to availability of friendly forces.
content.content: 氏族的科学家听说了内天体使用的C3系统后,开发了超新星(Nova)氏族复合电子战套件(CEWS).通过将看门狗(Watchdog)氏族复合电子战套件(CEWS)和C3系统相结合,他们创造了一种可以找到敌人,在ECM范围内隐藏使用它的单位,并向其他友军单位提供目标数据的工具.此外,超新星CEWS不需要C3作为预置:它可以在运行中编程,以增强友军火力.

content.content: 由天龙联合体开发,作为'粗糙'的天琴座短柄斧的'高贵'替代品,该剑造成的伤害几乎和斧子一样,并且由于其出色的平衡性获得了更好的命中率.这把原型剑被永久的固定在机甲的手臂上.它可能会损坏或失效,但可以被修复.

content.original: Clan Ferro-Fibrous armor merged with a Void signature system creating a new special armor, that not only stealths the mech, but also protects it with the properties of the ferro-fibrous armor. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Clan Ferro-Fibrous armor merged with a Void signature system creating a new special armor, that not only stealths the mech, but also protects it with the properties of the ferro-fibrous armor. Reserves 6 slots and requires an ECM. CASE Enabled
content.content: 氏族纤维钢装甲和空白信号系统的结合创造了一种新型特殊装甲,不仅可以使机甲隐身,还可以利用纤维钢装甲的特性保护机甲.占用6槽位并且需要ECM.起用CASE

content.original: Based on the unique HarJel Compound found on LV-426, which has the capacity to break up and absorb EM and light Waves, does the Black Carapace have self repair functionality with a basic Stealth Functionality
content.prevOriginal: Based on the unique HarJel Compound found on LV-426, which has the capacity to break up and absorb EM and light Waves, does the Black Carapace have self repair functionality with a basic Stealth Functionality
content.content: 基于LV-426上发现的独特哈杰尔化合物,它具有分解和吸收电磁波和光波的能力,黑甲壳具有自我修复能力和基本的隐身功能.

content.original: A specially strengthened Ferro-Fibrous based armor, blessed in the name of Kerensky. The actual technology behind it is largely unknown and kept very secret by the Word.
content.prevOriginal: A specially strengthened Ferro-Fibrous based armor, blessed in the name of Kerensky. The actual technology behind it is largely unknown and kept very secret by the Word.
content.content: 一种专门强化的纤维钢装甲,以克伦斯基的名义命名.背后的实际技术在很大程度上是未知的,并且对世界保密.

content.original: A further development of the Sanctus armor, the Exsecratio has supposedly been bathed in the blood of enemies of the Word giving the 'Mech the power to hide from foes. However, it is more realistic to think that the armor uses some kind of advanced Stealth technology, and the rest is just one of the Word of Blake typical rituals to instill more zeal into its members.
content.prevOriginal: A further development of the Sanctus armor, the Exsecratio has supposedly been bathed in the blood of enemies of the Word giving the 'Mech the power to hide from foes. However, it is more realistic to think that the armor uses some kind of advanced Stealth technology, and the rest is just one of the Word of Blake typical rituals to instill more zeal into its members.
content.content: 这是圣徒装甲的进一步发展,据说圣言沐浴在这个世界敌人的鲜血中,赋予了机甲躲避敌人的力量.然而,更现实的想法是,装甲使用了某种先进的隐身技术,剩下的只是布莱克之道典型仪式的一个说词,以向成员灌输更多的狂热.

content.original: Based on recovered Clan Technologies have Comstar Technicians managed to reverse Engineer the integrated CASE common among Clan 'Mech's, not being able to fully integrate it is this Light ferro Plating Slightly Heavier but is able to be upgraded with Clan CASEII.
content.prevOriginal: Based on recovered Clan Technologies have Comstar Technicians managed to reverse Engineer the integrated CASE common among Clan 'Mech's, not being able to fully integrate it is this Light ferro Plating Slightly Heavier but is able to be upgraded with Clan CASEII.
content.content: 基于从氏族回收的技术,通讯之星的技术员成功的对氏族机甲中常见的集成CASE技术进行了逆向,但仍然无法完全集成.这是一种轻型刚装甲板,重量稍重,但可以使用氏族CASE II进行升级.

content.original: Pretty much just a Standard Armored Cowl, but some joker decided to label a button that shuts off some heatsinks with 'WEEE' to enable linked TSM
content.prevOriginal: Pretty much just a Standard Armored Cowl, but some joker decided to label a button that shuts off some heatsinks with 'WEEE' to enable linked TSM
content.content: 几乎就是一个装甲座舱,但是一些小丑决定用"WEEE"标记一个用来关闭某些散热器的按钮,以便持续使用"三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)"
谷神(Ceres)金属角斗士座舱模型
更强的近战和更快的速度

content.original: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.prevOriginal: The Guardian ECM Suite was introduced in 2597 by Johnston Industries of the Terran Hegemony. Designed to interfere with guided weaponry, targeting computers, and communication systems, the Guardian was typically used to shield allied units from such equipment by emitting a broad-band signal meant to confuse radar, infrared, ultraviolet, magscan and sonar sensors.
content.content: 守护者ECM套件于2597年由人类霸权的约翰斯顿工业公司推出. 旨在干扰制导武器、目标电脑和通讯系统,守护者通常用发射宽频信号的方法来干扰雷达、红外、紫外、磁扫描和声呐传感器,进而保护盟友免受此类设备的影响.

content.original: Basically still Electronics Counter Measures that scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems, though less elegant because it simply sends ancient Heavy Metal and Rock over any and all frequencies, even IR and Magnetic...
content.prevOriginal: Basically still Electronics Counter Measures that scrambles Enemy Targeting and Missile Systems, though less elegant because it simply sends ancient Heavy Metal and Rock over any and all frequencies, even IR and Magnetic...
content.content: 基本上仍是电子对抗措施(ECM),可以干扰敌人的瞄准和导弹系统,但不太优雅,因为它只是在任何可能的频率上发送古老的重金属摇滚,而不是红外和磁...

content.original: The AR-12 Sheathed Directional Beacon with Guardian ECM Suit is a Star League Cockpit and Sensor system specifically designed for the Exterminator BattleMech, combining the benefits of an Active probe with a ECM system.
content.prevOriginal: The AR-12 Sheathed Directional Beacon with Guardian ECM Suit is a Star League Cockpit and Sensor system specifically designed for the Exterminator BattleMech, combining the benefits of an Active probe with a ECM system.
content.content: AR-12 护套定向信标和守护者ECM套件是一个专门为"歼灭者"机甲设计星联座舱和传感器系统,结合了主动探针和ECM系统的优点.

content.original: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.
content.prevOriginal: Activated ability (uses Firing action). Performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius, as indicated by the spinning gold ring. Will go into cooldown state after use.

增加 视野/传感器效率/健康.

content.original: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.prevOriginal: Reduces effectiveness of stealthed and ECM shielded units
content.content: 降低隐身和ECM防护单元的效果

content.original: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.prevOriginal: Provides detailed information on enemy units
content.content: 提供敌军单位的详细信息

content.original: This BattleMech got outfitted with a Experimental CASE system that encompasses every Limb and Location.
content.prevOriginal: This BattleMech got outfitted with a Experimental CASE system that encompasses every Limb and Location.
content.content: 该单位配备一个实验性CASE系统,涵盖了每一个肢体和部位.

content.original: A Searchlight hardwired into the System Comm and Sensors Array allows to easier detect and highlight nearby Targets
content.prevOriginal: A Searchlight hardwired into the System Comm and Sensors Array allows to easier detect and highlight nearby Targets
content.content: 探照灯接驳到通迅和传感器系统中,可以更容易的检测和显示附近目标.

content.original: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.prevOriginal: Shows their vision when lancemates move
content.content: 当队友移动时显示他们的视野

content.original: Reinforced Industrial Structure with Experimental TSM is a bulky and expensive structure designed for deep space exploration and prospector chassis.
content.prevOriginal: Reinforced Industrial Structure with Experimental TSM is a bulky and expensive structure designed for deep space exploration and prospector chassis.
content.content: 带有实验性TSM的强化工业结构是一种体积庞大且价格昂贵的结构,专为深空探测和探勘者底盘设计.
强化结构降低严重损伤率.

content.original: A Industrial prototype Small Cockpit, moving the Life Support to the Side Torsos to free up Space in the Head Location
content.prevOriginal: A Industrial prototype Small Cockpit, moving the Life Support to the Side Torsos to free up Space in the Head Location
content.content: 一个原型小型工业座舱,将生命支持转移到侧躯干,以释放头部的空间.

content.original: As part of the experiments that led to Triple Strength Myomer, the NAIS and other research firms went through several prototypes. Though unsuited for combat use, there were several formulations that held promise for Industrial applications. This information, allowed IndustrialMech manufacturers to create Industrial Triple Strength Myomer which was ideally suited for loading, hauling, and other heavy lift tasks.
content.prevOriginal: As part of the experiments that led to Triple Strength Myomer, the NAIS and other research firms went through several prototypes. Though unsuited for combat use, there were several formulations that held promise for Industrial applications. This information, allowed IndustrialMech manufacturers to create Industrial Triple Strength Myomer which was ideally suited for loading, hauling, and other heavy lift tasks.
content.content: 做为三倍强化人工肌肉实验的一部分,NAIS和其他公司研究了多个原型.虽然不适合用于作战,但有几种原型有望应用在工业方面.这些原型让机甲制造商能够制造工业三倍强化人工肌肉,非常适用于装载、运输和其他繁重的托举任务.
工业三倍强化人工肌肉(TSM)

content.original: Cyrus Miles stole this sink from a restaurant he hated and bolted it on to his infamous mech to use as a mace in the arenas. Gives a whole new meaning to KitchenAid.
content.prevOriginal: Cyrus Miles stole this sink from a restaurant he hated and bolted it on to his infamous mech to use as a mace in the arenas. Gives a whole new meaning to KitchenAid.

content.original: Reactive Armor Plating (sometimes called Blazer Armor) is a type of specialized armor that uses a series of microscopic explosions to reduce the effects of explosive weapons fire like missiles, artillery, and mortars. Reserves 10 slots.
content.prevOriginal: Reactive Armor Plating (sometimes called Blazer Armor) is a type of specialized armor that uses a series of microscopic explosions to reduce the effects of explosive weapons fire like missiles, artillery, and mortars. Reserves 10 slots.
content.content: 反应装甲(也称燃烧装甲)是一种特殊装甲,使用一系列微型爆炸来减少导弹、自动炮和迫击炮等爆炸性武器攻击的影响.占用10个槽位.

content.original: Actuators control a 'Mech’s limbs and are used to perform Melee attacks at close quarters. All 'Mechs come equipped with stock Actuators, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.prevOriginal: Actuators control a 'Mech’s limbs and are used to perform Melee attacks at close quarters. All 'Mechs come equipped with stock Actuators, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.content: 伺服机构控制机甲的肢体,用于在近距离进行近战攻击.所有机甲都配有伺服机构,以安装强化组件提升表现.

content.original: YOURE NOT SUPPOSED TO HAVE THIS
content.prevOriginal: YOURE NOT SUPPOSED TO HAVE THIS

content.content: 墓地克洛诺斯手臂模块

content.prevOriginal: Melee attacks deal [AMT] more stability damage.

content.original: The Optimized Capacitors extending from the Warhammer's engine allow for improved linkages for all Energy weapons mounted on the 'Mech. This boosts the damage output of those weapons beyond their stock capability, capitalizing on the Warhammer's typical loadout.
content.prevOriginal: The Optimized Capacitors extending from the Warhammer's engine allow for improved linkages for all Energy weapons mounted on the 'Mech. This boosts the damage output of those weapons beyond their stock capability, capitalizing on the Warhammer's typical loadout.

content.original: Energy weapons on this unit deal [AMT] more damage.
content.prevOriginal: Energy weapons on this unit deal [AMT] more damage.

content.original: Gyros counteract the massive amounts of momentum generated from 'Mech engines and allow for precision maneuvering and recovery from stability-impacting attacks. All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Gyro, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.prevOriginal: Gyros counteract the massive amounts of momentum generated from 'Mech engines and allow for precision maneuvering and recovery from stability-impacting attacks. All 'Mechs come equipped with a stock Gyro, which can be upgraded for improved performance.
content.content: 陀螺仪抵消了机甲引擎产生的大量动量,并允许精确机动并从稳定性攻击中恢复.所有机甲都配置了陀螺仪空间,可以升级以提高性能.
降低即将到来的稳定伤害

When activated, the probe performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within its radius before entering a cooldown state. This component cannot be mounted along with the ECM component.
content.prevOriginal: This prototype electronic warfare component recreates the capabilities of the LosTech Beagle Active Probe. Friendly units within its ECM field gain Missile Defense and receive a +4 bonus against missiles plus immunity to Indirect Fire. Friendly units within an ECM field are effectively cloaked and cannot be targeted. This component cannot be mounted along with the Active Probe component.

content.original:
Units within an ECM field gain a Stealth Charge and cannot be targeted.

Firing a weapon, using an activated ability, or an enemy penetrating the ECM field removes a Stealth Charge. Being Sensor Locked removes all Stealth Charges.

ECM场内的单位获得隐身层数,无法成为目标.

开火,使用主动能力或者敌人进入ECM场会移除ECM层数.传感器锁定会移除所有隐身层数.

content.original:
PASSIVE: The ECM carrier projects an ECM field, building Stealth Charges for itself and allies if it starts or ends its turn with no active enemy units within the field.

ECM carriers also receive a bonus Stealth Charge.
content.prevOriginal:
PASSIVE: The ECM carrier projects an ECM field, building Stealth Charges for itself and allies if it starts or ends its turn with no active enemy units within the field.

ECM carriers also receive a bonus Stealth Charge.

被动:ECM的携带者会产生一个ECM场,如果它开始或结束其回合时,区域内没有活动的敌人单位,则为自己和盟友增加隐身层数.

ECM携带者额外获得隐身充功能奖励.

content.original: This unit is spotting against an enemy ECM field, reducing Stealth Charges by 1 each round for all visible enemies within the field.
content.prevOriginal: This unit is spotting against an enemy ECM field, reducing Stealth Charges by 1 each round for all visible enemies within the field.
content.content: 该单位正在被敌人的ECM侦测,对所有在ECM区域范围内的敌人,该单位每回合-1隐身.

content.original:
Prototype Electronic Warfare component. Adds an ECM field that provides a passive defense against missiles and immunity to indirect fire. Friendly units in the ECM field also gain Stealth Charges and cannot be targeted by direct fire unless spotted by enemy units within the ECM field or sensor locked. The ECM carrier gains an additional Stealth Charge.

The EW Suite also adds the Active Probe ability to unit's weapons panel. Active Probe is a triggered ability that uses the firing action and performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within range. Note: you can only equip one Prototype component on most 'Mechs.
content.prevOriginal:
Prototype Electronic Warfare component. Adds an ECM field that provides a passive defense against missiles and immunity to indirect fire. Friendly units in the ECM field also gain Stealth Charges and cannot be targeted by direct fire unless spotted by enemy units within the ECM field or sensor locked. The ECM carrier gains an additional Stealth Charge.

The EW Suite also adds the Active Probe ability to unit's weapons panel. Active Probe is a triggered ability that uses the firing action and performs a Sensor Lock against all enemies within range. Note: you can only equip one Prototype component on most 'Mechs.
content.content:
原型电子战组件.增加了一个ECM场,提供了对导弹的被动防御能力或对间瞄开火的免疫.EMC区域范围内的所有友军会获得隐身点数,除非场内敌方单位发现或被传感器锁定,否则无法被直接瞄准射击.ECM携带者会额外获得隐身点数.

电子战套件还为单位的武器面板提供了主动探测器能力.主动探测是一种触发能力,使用射击动作并对射程内所有敌人进行传感器锁定.注意:你只能在大多数机甲上装备一个原型组件.

content.original: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/10s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses AC10 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: One of the most powerful and efficient weapons mounted in combat, AC/10s are known for their heavy damage and ability to stagger opponents. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/10s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses AC10 Ammo.

content.original: The king of the battlefield in terms of raw damage, AC/20s hit harder than any other weapon. However, this comes at the expense of weight, range, and severely limited ammunition. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/20s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses AC20 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The king of the battlefield in terms of raw damage, AC/20s hit harder than any other weapon. However, this comes at the expense of weight, range, and severely limited ammunition. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/20s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses AC20 Ammo.
content.content: 就基础伤害而言,AC/20是战场之王,它比其他的任何武器都更具杀伤力.然而,这是以重量、射程和严重受限的弹药为代价.与所有自动加农炮武器一样,AC20在连续射击后也会受后座力影响. 使用AC20弹药.

content.original: Intended for use as supporting fire at very long range, AC/2s deal moderate damage with low heat and a large ammunition count per ton. Uses AC2 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: Intended for use as supporting fire at very long range, AC/2s deal moderate damage with low heat and a large ammunition count per ton. Uses AC2 Ammo.
content.content: AC/2用于远距离支援火力,以低热和大量的每吨弹药造成中等伤害. 使用AC2弹药.

content.original: A flexible weapon, AC/5s strike a balance between long range, power, and performance. These weapons are commonly found on medium 'Mechs as their primary source of reliable damage. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/5s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses AC5 Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: A flexible weapon, AC/5s strike a balance between long range, power, and performance. These weapons are commonly found on medium 'Mechs as their primary source of reliable damage. Like all Autocannon weaponry, AC/5s suffer from recoil effects from continuous fire. Uses AC5 Ammo.
content.content: AC5是一种灵活的武器,它在射程、功率和性能间取得了平衡. 这些武器通常在中型机甲上才能被发现,是其可靠伤害的主要来源.与所有自动火炮武器一样,AC5在连续射击后也会受到后座的影响. 使用AC5弹药.

content.original: Flamer weapons are unique in that they deal little physical damage but instead expel superheated plasma, applying substantial heat to their target. When done properly, this can hamper enemy return fire or even cause the targeted unit to shut down from overheating.
content.prevOriginal: Flamer weapons are unique in that they deal little physical damage but instead expel superheated plasma, applying substantial heat to their target. When done properly, this can hamper enemy return fire or even cause the targeted unit to shut down from overheating.
content.content: 喷火器的独特之处在于,它不造成物理伤害,而是排出过热的等离子体,增加目标大量热量.如果操作得当,这和阻止敌人的回击,甚至让目标单位因过热而死机.

content.original: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: A Gauss Rifle uses electromagnetic charges to accelerate metallic rounds at extremely high speed, dealing massive damage by kinetic force alone. Uses Gauss Ammo. VOLATILE!
content.content: 高斯线膛炮使用电磁电荷以极高的速度发射金属子弹,单靠动能造成巨大的伤害. 使用高斯弹药 不稳定!
反抗军高斯线膛炮(废弃)

content.original: The LRM10 rack of Long-Range Missiles occupies a supporting fire role when mounted on most units, with fairly low damage balanced by low heat and ammunition consumption. Like all LRMs, LRM10s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to toggle Hot-Loading. (HL) missiles have no minimum range but can Misfire, damaging the launcher.
content.prevOriginal: The LRM10 rack of Long-Range Missiles occupies a supporting fire role when mounted on most units, with fairly low damage balanced by low heat and ammunition consumption. Like all LRMs, LRM10s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain. LRM can fill a variety of roles using specialized ammunition. Left Click on Chance to hit during battle to toggle Hot-Loading. (HL) missiles have no minimum range but can Misfire, damaging the launcher.
content.content: 远程导弹发射器(LRM)10安装在大多数单位上时起到了辅助火力作用,通过低热耗和弹药消耗来平衡相当低的伤害. 与所有LRM一样,LRM10能够在侦察单位帮助下越过障碍物和地形间瞄射击.LRM可以通过使用专用弹药承担多种角色. 左击射击模式可以切换到热负合模式(HL).HL导弹没有最低射程,但可能会失火,损坏发射器

content.content: 远程导弹发射器(LRM)10安装在大多数单位上时起到了辅助火力作用,通过低热耗和弹药消耗来平衡相当低的伤害. 与所有LRM一样,LRM10能够在侦察单位帮助下越过障碍物和地形间瞄射击.LRM可以通过使用专用弹药承担多种角色. 左击射击模式可以切换到热负合模式(HL).HL导弹没有最低射程,但可能会失火,损坏发射器

content.original: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. However, they have a greatly increased chance to cause Criticals when they impact a target that has been stripped of its armor.
content.prevOriginal: Machine Guns deal very little damage, have severely limited range, and depend upon volatile ammunition stores. However, they have a greatly increased chance to cause Criticals when they impact a target that has been stripped of its armor.
content.content: 机枪造成的伤害非常低,射程非常有限,并且依赖于不稳定的弹药.然而,当他们撞击已剥去装甲的目标时,造成严重损伤的机率大大增加.

content.original: Particle Projector Cannons ''PPCs'' fire streams of energized lightning at their target that deal substantial damage and stability impact. However, this comes with intense heat generation and bulkiness. PPCs also generate a mild EM field that degrades the firing capability of their target. Left Click on Chance to Hit during battle to toggle the Field Inhibitor. (FIOFF) Has no minimum range penalty but can Misfire.
content.prevOriginal: Particle Projector Cannons ''PPCs'' fire streams of energized lightning at their target that deal substantial damage and stability impact. However, this comes with intense heat generation and bulkiness. PPCs also generate a mild EM field that degrades the firing capability of their target. Left Click on Chance to Hit during battle to toggle the Field Inhibitor. (FIOFF) Has no minimum range penalty but can Misfire.
content.content: 粒子投射炮(PPC)向目标发射通电电流,对目标造成巨大破坏并从稳定影响.然而,这伴随着强烈的发热和笨重的体积重量. PPC还会产生轻微的电磁场,降低其目标的瞄准能力. 在战斗中左键点击以切换到场抑制器关闭(FIOFF)模式,没有最低射程惩罚,但可能失火.
电磁干扰降低传感器效率.

content.original: A tiny rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM2s deal little damage but also cost almost nothing in the way of weight, space, heat, or ammunition consumption. As for all SRMs, SRM2 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons.
content.prevOriginal: A tiny rack of Short-Range Missiles, SRM2s deal little damage but also cost almost nothing in the way of weight, space, heat, or ammunition consumption. As for all SRMs, SRM2 shots deal above-average stability impact per hit compared to other weapons.
content.content: SRM2是一种小型的短程导弹发射器,造成伤害很小,但在重量、空间、热量或弹药消耗方面几乎不需要任何成本. 与其他武器相比,所有SRM2射击的命中率高于平均水平.

content.original: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition.
content.prevOriginal: The Laser Anti-Missile System (LAMS) is an advanced variation of the standard Anti-Missile Systems. While the standard system utilizes a machine gun linked to specialized tracking systems, the LAMS uses a Small Pulse Laser, ensuring that the system never runs out of ammunition.
content.content: 激光反导系统(LAMS)是标准反导系统的高级变体.虽然标准系统是使用与专用追踪系相连的机枪,但LAMS使用小型脉冲激光,确保系统永远不会耗尽弹药.

content.original: The 'Iron Dome' Advanced Point Defense System, which is also known as APD or APDS, is an Anti-Missile System designed to protect multiple units from incoming missile fire, capable to blanket the sky with a shroud of metal. Uses AMS Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The 'Iron Dome' Advanced Point Defense System, which is also known as APD or APDS, is an Anti-Missile System designed to protect multiple units from incoming missile fire, capable to blanket the sky with a shroud of metal. Uses AMS Ammo.
content.content: "铁穹"先进点防御系统,也被称为APD或APDS,是一种反导系统,目的是为了保护多个单位免受来袭导弹的攻击,能够让一层金属弹药覆盖天空. 使用AMS弹药

content.original: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.prevOriginal: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller ﬁghters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations. With a little creativity a decent mechtech crew can bolt these onto a mech as an air defense measure.
content.content: 不如天琴同盟国和狼氏族推出的空对空箭导弹威力强大,这种更小的空对空导弹版本首次亮相在塔马林德公国的盟军航空部队和艾丽斯·罗塞特·马里克公爵夫人的抵抗运动.这些轻型空空导弹(LAA)体积更小、重量更轻可以由更小的战斗机携带,在大气圈中作战产生的阻力要小的多.只需要一点创造力,一个像样的机甲技师就可以将这些装置固定在机甲上作为防空措施.

content.original: The Arrow IV is a stand-alone, missile based, artillery system, designed to augment conventional systems such as the Long Tom and the Sniper. It was first introduced by the Terran Hegemony in 2600 and became a staple of the Star League Defense Force. Although the technology to create Arrow IVs was lost during the Star League's collapse, it was recovered by Capellan Confederation engineers in 3044 working off of surviving examples and the Helm Memory Core. 5 shots.
content.prevOriginal: The Arrow IV is a stand-alone, missile based, artillery system, designed to augment conventional systems such as the Long Tom and the Sniper. It was first introduced by the Terran Hegemony in 2600 and became a staple of the Star League Defense Force. Although the technology to create Arrow IVs was lost during the Star League's collapse, it was recovered by Capellan Confederation engineers in 3044 working off of surviving examples and the Helm Memory Core. 5 shots.
content.content: 箭IV是一种独立的、基于导弹的火炮系统,目的是增强长汤姆(Long Tom)和狙击手(Sniper)等常规系统.它最初是在2600年由人类霸权引入的,并成为星联防御部队的主要装备.尽管在星联崩溃后箭IV的技术失传,但它在3044年被卡佩兰同盟国的工程师们从海姆(Helm)记忆核心中恢复. 5发装.

content.original: Inferno-IV Missiles are a variation of Arrow IV missiles first introduced by the Capellan Confederation. The technology was based on recovered Clan FASCAM missiles and was designed to deploy the newly-invented Inferno Mines. Unfortunately, the mines proved to be unstable and would instead ignite upon impact, causing widespread fires. 10 rounds.
content.prevOriginal: Inferno-IV Missiles are a variation of Arrow IV missiles first introduced by the Capellan Confederation. The technology was based on recovered Clan FASCAM missiles and was designed to deploy the newly-invented Inferno Mines. Unfortunately, the mines proved to be unstable and would instead ignite upon impact, causing widespread fires. 10 rounds.
content.content: 炼狱IV导弹是卡佩兰同盟国引入的箭IV导弹的变体.该技术以回收的氏族FASCAM导弹为基础,目的是部署新发明的炼狱地雷.不幸的是,这些地雷被证明是不稳定的,一旦受到撞击就会被点燃,造成大面积的火灾.10发装.

content.original: This was an Advanced Tactical Missile system, before someone turned it into this wreckage. This is the famous case of getting a weapon into some nutcases hand but no ammo for it. The whole system has been turned upside down, the Artemis got completely yanked out and they put a jury rigged RAC-feeder in its place, allowing the speed at which it launches Missiles to be adjusted, but i'd be carefull setting it to high speed, though slower speeds improve its lock on speed. VOLATILE! Uses LRM/MRM/SRM Ammo. Firing Modes: LRM, MRM, SRM

content.content: 在有人本它变成一堆破烂前,这是一个先进的战术导弹系统.这是把没有弹药的武器交到一些疯子手中的一个非常有名的例.整个系统都被颠倒,月神系统被完全取了出来,然后在它的位置安装一个手工的RAC馈线,以使它能够调整发射导弹的速度,但我会小心的将其设置为高速,尽管较慢的速度可以提高它的锁定速度. 不稳定! 使用LRM/MRM/SRM弹药 开火模式:LRM,MRM,SRM

content.original: The Astral Hammer is in a huge 245 mm Ultra Autocannon that through an advanced reload mechanism is able to deliver almost 300 kilograms of ammunition in a 10 second period. This would technically classify it as a UAC/30, but since this designation doesn't normally exist and the Blakeist engineers wanted a more holy name the classification was never used.
content.prevOriginal: The Astral Hammer is in a huge 245 mm Ultra Autocannon that through an advanced reload mechanism is able to deliver almost 300 kilograms of ammunition in a 10 second period. content.content: 星体之锤是一个巨大的245毫米终极自动加农炮,过先进的重装填机制,够在10秒内发射近300公斤弹药.技术上来说,应该把它归类为UAC/30,由于这种命名通常不存在,布莱克斯特的工程师想要一个更神圣的名字,种分类从未使用过.

content.original: The SodaPopAC-TAC-UltraLightAutoRevolver is another salvage miracle from Cyrus Miles. This chopped RAC2 was modified to fire rounds formed from SodaPop cans, hardened to form a penetrating shell, and filled with a sticky liquid that's guaranteed to short-circuit and gum-up any internals it hits. Weight savings came at the expense of combat reloads and any range whatsoever. Still not sure what Through Armor Criticals mean though, only thing I got from Cyrus was '4th Wall'. 1 SHOT!

content.content: 苏打水-TAC-超级轻型转轮自动炮是从Cyrus Miles打捞到的另一个奇迹.这种破碎者RAC/2被修改为发射苏打水罐子制成的弹药,硬化后可以形成穿透性的外壳,并填充有黏性液体,以确保短路并堵塞其击中的任何内部.降低重量是以需要重新装填和射程为代价的.不过,我仍然不知道穿甲损伤是什么意思,从Cyrus获得的唯一信息是'第四面墙'.单发!

content.original: The Fluid Gun is nothing more than a militarized Fluid Sprayer system. By toughening the feed lines and storage tanks, the engineers of Solaris VII created a system roughly equivalent to a Flamer. Unlike the flamer however, the Fluid Gun can store and spray a variety of fluid types. Clever arena fighters have used water, oil slicks, Inferno Fuel, Cooling Fluid, and Corrosive Fluids in matches. Uses Fluid Cannisters (Ammo).

content.content: 液体喷枪只不过是一个军事化的液体喷射器.索拉里斯VII的工程师们通过强化供给管线和储罐,创建了一个大致相当于火焰器的系统.然而,与火焰器不同; 液体喷枪可以存储并喷射多种液体.聪明的竟技场战士在比赛中使用了水、浮油、炼狱燃料、冷却液和腐蚀性液体. 使用液体罐(弹药).

content.content: 这件破旧不堪、饱经风霜的武器是星联时代的遗物,是失落科技中的杰作,是轨道炮.后来一些海盗发现了它,并让它再次工作,膛内系统完全混乱,只能使用装有磁性材料的金属盒. 不稳定! 使用轨道炮弹药 移动降低伤害

content.original: The Railgun is a massive weapon adapted from WarShips to be used on BattleMechs. By using the fact that a superheavy chassis has more mass and more robust power circuitry, Comstar created the Light Railgun, slightly lower performance but considerably smaller. Uses Railgun Ammo.
content.prevOriginal: The Railgun is a massive weapon adapted from WarShips to be used on BattleMechs. content.content: 轨道炮是一种重型武器,战舰武器改造而来,用于战斗机甲.用超重型底盘有更大的质量和更坚固的能量线路的状况,讯之星创造了轻型轨道炮,能略低,体积相当小. 使用轨道炮弹药

content.original: The Grazer is one of many dead end attempts at producing a next generation directed energy weapon. Particles in the Gamma Ray range are not as easily stopped by solid matter as conventional light resulting in improved armor penetration chance, but only on par with a gauss rifle. Mounted on the, also experimental, Urbanlord, it proved effective in fighting to Free Tiaw...St. Ives. However the system was ultimately judged too difficult to manufacture on a large scale, and some mechwarriors reported finding it's multiple firing modes distracting and difficult to manage in the heat of battle.

content.content: '草食动物'是众多的定向能武器中的一条死路.伽马射线范围内的粒子不像常规光线那样容易被固体物质阻挡,从而提高了对装甲的穿透力,但只能和重型高斯线膛炮相媲美.安装在同样是实验性的'都市领主'上.在解放圣艾文斯的战斗中,证明该武器是有效的.然而该系统最终被认为是难以大规模制造的,一些机甲战士报告说,他们发现它的多种射击模式分散了注意力,而且在战斗中难以管理.

content.original: The Medium-Range Missile Launcher was designed by scientists at Luthien Armor Works. MRMs are dead-fire missiles that are fired more like lasers than missiles. In order to pack as many missiles as possible into one salvo, scientists removed guidance systems and made the whole package smaller. Though this was seen as a step backwards in technological development, the inexpensive and deadly MRMs have spread throughout the Draconis Combine and to many mercenary units. Uses MRM Ammo. 5 Salvos VOLATILE!

content.content: 中程导弹发射器(MRM)是由Luhine Amor Works的科学家设计的.MRM是死火导弹,发射的方式更像激光,而不是导弹. 为了将尽可能多的到导弹一齐发射,科学家们拆除了它们的制导系统,并使整个整个武器包更小. 尽管这被视为技术发展的一步,但廉价且致命的MRM在天龙联合体和许多雇用兵单位中传播. 使用MRM弹药5发装 不稳定!

content.original: It's a PPC designed for a small spacecraft. The EMP Field is generates is massive, affecting units near the target, disrupting myomer and sensor systems. It's hard to focus it on nearby targets due to the large minimum range in safe mode. FIOFF Has no minimum range penalty and does full damage at close range, but is very likely to fry the weapon. Boosted Mode greatly increases damage, but has distance falloff and requires a recharge period.

content.content: 这是为小型航天器设计的PPC. 它产生的电池脉冲场是巨大的,影响目标附近的单位,干扰人工肌肉和传感器系统. 由于安全模式下,最低射程较大,很难将其聚焦在附近目标上. FIOFF没有最低射程惩罚,在近距离造成全部伤害,但很可能炸毁武器. 增强模式大大增加了伤害,但随距离衰减,且需要充电时间 .
